results.name: Ethernal Wall
results.description:
A Non-Fungible Token (ERC-721) that store your words on the blockchain.
The messages will be immutable and uncensorable living forever inside Ethereum.
results.fullDescription:
Mint your own token with  your personal message.The token will be allways attached to your  ethereum address as its author, but its property can be transfered as a  NFT token.

You can keep it, give it or sell it whenever you want.

results.name: BeyondNFT
results.description: Create, Collect and sell Interactive NFTs: NFTs defined by code that are interactive and can evolve over time!
results.fullDescription:
BeyondNFT is a platform facilitating the creation and distribution of Interactive NFTs for technical and non technical users.

Interactive NFT (iNFT) are NFTs for which behavior is defined using HTML/CSS and JavaScript code, allowing it to be much more than just images, videos or audios.

Anything that runs in the browser can therefore become an NFT.

This is what Interactive NFTs already make possible.

BeyondNFT now runs on Ethereum Mainnet, the Matic network, the xDai network.

On Matic and xDai, due to gas being so cheap, we take the cost of Minting new NFTs.

This way, we are hoping to open the world of NFTs to more people, allowing people to mint their first NFTs without holding any token.

---

The iNFT standard is already in development and Open Source, developers and creatives are invited to contribute and communicate what they would see possible to create with it, but also improve it.

results.name: NFT Sprites
results.description: AI-generated NFT's.
results.fullDescription: NFT Sprites are AI-generated people turned into NFT's (Non-Fungible Tokens), which you can buy and sell on the Ethereum blockchain. None of the people in this game are real -- they are 100% generated by state-of-the-art AI. By buying one of the NFT's here, you are the sole owner of the NFT until the end of time (as will be shown on the blockchain) unless you sell it or gift it to another person.

results.name: ECETO
results.description: Profitability through patience - now on the Ethereum blockchain.
results.fullDescription:
A dividend-producing hourglass contract that promotes a culture of savings and longevity. The token increases and decreases in value algorithmically with every purchase or sale, producing dividends for tokenholders through each transaction fee. Penalties for early withdrawal before 30 days.

Crystal Elephant Token: Be the Elephant in the room.

results.name: tofuNFT
results.description: NFT marketplace focused on GameFi & collectibles on multi-chain. Formerly, SCV NFT Market.
results.fullDescription: tofuNFT.com is the largest multichain NFT marketplace lives on 30+ EVM-compatible public chains, focused on GameFi. Enjoy exploring & trading with your buddies!

results.name: Satoshi Blocks NFT
results.description: Each "Satoshi Block" is a unique digital art inspired by the story of the lost bitcoins generated by Satoshi Nakamoto early mining.
results.fullDescription:
Each "Satoshi Block" is a unique digital art inspired by the story of the lost bitcoins generated by Satoshi Nakamoto early mining.

Satoshi Nakamoto is the pseudonymous name used by the creator of Bitcoin. Many sources have found that he mined during the first 2 years of Bitcoin (2009-2010) at least 21479 blocks each with 50 unspent BTC reward.

The bitcoin protocol uses "merkle root" to verify blocks and a unique "merkle root" is associated with each of these blocks with lost bitcoins mined by Satoshi Nakamoto.

Each of the Satoshi Block NFT is a digital signature of a unique generated digital art using the merkle root long number in homage to the corresponding block number (or height) with forever lost and unspent bitcoins.

The Satoshi Blocks NFT symbol is "HFB" In Memoriam of Satoshi Nakamoto true identity.

results.name: WardenSwap
results.description: You swap, AI does the rest. The First best-rate AI swap with the lowest gas fees on multi-chains.
results.fullDescription: WardenSwap is the first Decentralized Exchange Aggregator with built-in Machine Learning. Our Best-Rate Query Engine will walk through all possible paths and return the best one for you! It is done within a second 🚀

results.name: CompliFi
results.description: Decentralised derivative issuance protocol + AMM
results.fullDescription:
CompliFi is a combination of a derivative issuance protocol and an automated market maker (AMM). It allows users to trade decentralised derivatives and become liquidity providers as easily as Uniswap, with all of the hard maths hidden behind the scenes. 

CompliFi derivatives are fully collateralised at all times, eliminating the risk of default. Users never face margin calls and their positions are never liquidated.

results.name: BondAppetit
results.description: BondAppetit is a DeFi protocol for business loans with a stablecoin (USDap) fully backed by real-world assets with fixed periodic income (bonds).
results.fullDescription:
BondAppetit is the first DeFi protocol with a stablecoin fully backed by real-world assets with fixed periodic income. Business can make loans from the protocol providing bonds as collateral.

The main asset inside the protocol’s ecosystem is the native stablecoin BondAppétit USD (USDap). The price of USDap is at a constant ratio of 1 to 1 with the US Dollar, and is always backed by sufficient collateral. To ensure transparency, the protocol updates the price of real world-assets based on several proven and recognized sources, such as Bloomberg and CBonds.

BondAppétit was built by a team of seasoned coders, lawyers, and financiers, who worked at and with the most well-known global corporations. The key founder is Artem Tolkachev, a former head of the Blockchain Lab at Deloitte. One of the advisers is Sasha Ivanov (CEO of Waves).

results.name: Unicly
results.description: Unicly is a protocol to combine, fractionalize, and trade NFTs.
results.fullDescription: Unicly is a permissionless, community-governed protocol to combine, fractionalize, and trade NFTs. Built by NFT collectors and DeFi enthusiasts, the protocol incentivizes NFT liquidity and provides a seamless trading experience for NFT assets by bringing AMMs and yield farming into the world of NFTs.

results.name: Unifty
results.description: UNIFTY is a new hub for NFT projects to mint, buy, sell, swap and create NFT farms with just a few clicks! No coding or difficult contract interactions required
results.fullDescription: Unifty is a multichain infrastructure platform for NFT creators and the digital creator ecosystem. Currently operational on Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain (BSC), xDAI, Polygon (ex Matic), and Celo. Unifty seeks to offer accessible and affordable nocode solutions to mint NFTs, and enable functionality. We also offer marketplaces on a number of networks, and offer native support of the first “interactive” NFTs (iNFTs).

results.name: Freedom Dividend Swap
results.description: Freedom Dividend Swap is a front-end extension of the Uniswap v2 protocol.  It has market metrics such as token price in USD and charts.
results.fullDescription:
Freedom Dividend Swap is a front-end extension of the Uniswap v2 protocol.  It has market metrics such as token price in USD and charts.

The Dapp also provides metrics for and allows users to collect a Freedom Dividend every 30 days.

results.name: Etherpoly
results.description: Etherpoly is an exciting game that allows players to acquire, improve and trade virtual cities on the blockchain. The game has its own ERC20 Cryptocurrency.
results.fullDescription:
Acquire, upgrade and trade virtual cities on Etherpoly.io

Etherpoly cities generate passive OLY income, that can be boosted by upgrading and building houses, offices, hotels or factories. OLY is Etherpoly's ERC-20 in-game cryptocurrency that can be used to acquire additional cities.

Etherpoly cities are ERC-721 NFTs, and exist in limited supply, as the available countries are hard coded into the smart contract.

Revenues for your city are influenced by factors such as your city's population, GDP and your existing upgrades.

results.name: NFT Fusion
results.description: Fuse your NFTs to form new creations!
results.fullDescription: Fuse your NFTs to form new creations! Stake your creations to earn additional yield 🙌

results.name: KeyFi
results.description: KeyFi is an all-in-one platform for tracking, swapping, and staking your tokens, and more.
results.fullDescription:
KeyFi is an all-in-one DeFi platform offering intelligent tools to track and manage your DeFi portfolio. Features include custom strategy builders, yield projection, portfolio tracking, and a powerful research dashboard.  

We seek to solve DeFi user challenges such as juggling multiple wallets/platforms/chains, manually comparing yield, and the lack of historical data.  Manage multiple assets, across multiple chains (ETH, BSC, and Polygon next), and across multiple platforms such as Compound, Aave, 1inch, and more, all from one convenient application.

results.name: Legasys
results.description: The Perfect Solution To The Ethereum Ecosystem
results.fullDescription:
A new blockchain with a full-fledged environment for developing high-performance CeFi cum DeFi application. It was built for cross-chain compatibility with Ethereum.

Legasys is EVM-compatible. It is developed to support the rich universe of Ethereum tools and dApps.

results.name: Drumpfs
results.description: Trump NFTs that donate profits to charities.
results.fullDescription:
Trump's Twitter account has been suspended, following years-worth of hateful, ignorant tweets.

Interestingly enough, since he can no longer tweet, his past tweets have become a limited commodity.

As such, we have decided to "revive" the twice-impeached President's old tweets and sell them as NFTs, alongside unique artwork created by neural nets. We are also donating ALL PROFITS from these sales to custom charities. For example, if the Trump tweet attacks Asian Americans, the money from that sale will go towards the Asian Mental Health Collective. 

Most tweets are listed for 0.0232 ETH, while 100 tweets are listed for 4.5 ETH. These "Infamous Tweets" are the 100 most iconic Trump tweets — in historical significance and in comedy.

In short, we seek to make something good out of the terrible, terrible mess that is the 45th President's tweets.

results.name: Wing Finance
results.description: Wing is a credit-based, cross-chain decentralized lending platform.
results.fullDescription:
Wing is a credit-based, cross-chain decentralized lending platform. By building a DeFi platform dedicated to the digital asset lending market, Wing supports cross-chain collaboration between different DeFi products. Combined with the Wing DAO, the platform's decentralized governance model and risk control mechanism aim to foster a mutually beneficial relationship between borrowers, creditors, and guarantors. In addition, Wing innovatively showcases a credit evaluation module as a strong example of credit-based DeFi.

Wing is designed to promote a mutually beneficial relationship between borrowers, creditors, and guarantors through a decentralized governance model and risk control mechanism. Through this integration with Ethereum, Wing opens a new window of opportunity for lending and borrowing from the hundreds of unique assets on Ethereum. Through bridges and UI/UX integrations between the Ethereum and the Ontology versions of Wing, users will have access to lower costs and faster speeds, thanks to the Ontology blockchain.

results.name: Waifusion
results.description: The #1 traded Waifu NFTs on OpenSea!
results.fullDescription: Waifusion is a digital Waifu collection. There are 16,384 guaranteed-unique Waifusion NFTs. They’re just like you; a beautiful work of art, but 2-D and therefore, superior, Anon-kun. Waifusions are randomly and fairly distributed on-chain which means they don’t like it when perverts try to add too many Waifus to their harem. Be faithful to your Waifus and only buy a max of 20 at once for your harem! Each Waifu is wholly unique and yours forever... unless you sell them... Baka.

results.name: Niftydudes
results.description: Niftydudes is a collectible based on the Ethereum blockchain and consists of a maximum of 1024 characters. No more Niftydudes will ever be created.
results.fullDescription: Most crypto collectibles work the exact same way. Someone chooses a topic, then randomly auto-generates or manually creates a bunch of NFTs while using some rare and some common traits and that's it. Niftydudes, on the other hand, involves the users in the creation process by giving them free choice in the combination of traits. Instead of offering a pregenerated token set, Niftydudes allows to create your own character based on a set of traits. You want a Niftydude with a specific hairstyle and clothing? Just choose the combination you like and mint him. You can even have different layers. You want your Dude to wear underwear over his pants? No problem. Well, you might ask how trait scarcity is ensured if anyone can just mint a combination they like. Each time a dude is created, a trait is being removed from the list of available traits. Well, not exactly each time, because it can happen that a trait gets selected for removal that has already been removed before. In this case no trait is being removed. This way the removal of traits slows down with every new Niftydude being minted. Using this approach it is impossible to know which of the available traits will be common and which will be rare. Some traits will be commen, some traits will be very rare and some might not be used at all.

results.name: Polychain Monsters
results.description: Cross-chain play-to-earn NFTs with varying scarcities which can be unpacked from booster packs with $PMON.
results.fullDescription:
Polychain Monsters aims to create a cross-chain digital collectible and gaming ecosystem with mainstream appeal. At its core, Polychain Monsters offers exquisitely animated NFTs, which can be unpacked from digital booster packs with $PMON on Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain and Polygon.

Each booster pack includes three Polymon with randomly selected traits such as type, color, horn and a glitter effect. Each attribute differs in rarity, which makes some combinations extraordinarily scarce and desirable. The Polymon will play an integral part in multiple on-chain and off-chain games which are currently being developed.

Polychain Monsters are already being traded on secondary marketplaces such as tofuNFT for over $100,000. Additionally, the collection gets constantly expanded by special-edition drops alongside partnerships with projects like ChainLink, Elrond and Polygon.

Next to being an NFT and gaming product, Polychain Monsters borrows well-established features from traditional decentralized finance (DeFi) projects, including Staking and  Farming.

In addition, Polychain Monsters pioneered a unique approach to NFT Staking, enabling collectors to earn weekly financial rewards through their Polymon collections based on the project's booster pack opening rates.

results.name: ChainGuardians
results.description: The world's first ecosystem where blockchain meets superheroes. Your one-stop digital ecosystem for collectibles, gaming, and metaverse.
results.fullDescription:
Welcome to ChainGuardians, a player-driven platform revolutionizing the gaming world!

By combining traditional gaming concepts with emerging technologies, we've created an ecosystem where players can earn rewards through our free-to-play digital asset mining platform and Role-Playing Game. But we don't stop there - we're constantly forming partnerships and working collaboratively to smash through ideological barriers oppressing user ownership and digital economies.

As a gamer in our community, you'll always be at the forefront of the key decisions we make through our community-driven organization, known as the CGDAO. Come join us and see why we believe that community is at the heart of every game, product, and platform we build.

results.name: NFFT Blockverse
results.description: An Ethereum blockchain-linked online real estate space where interested buyers can secure spaces or “Blocks'' and use the space for whatever they wish.
results.fullDescription:
NFFT.com 101

If you are new to the NFFT blockverse then you should strap yourself in because we are about to run you through the key points that became the moving force behind the platform’s rise to the NFT industry forefront:

  • NFFT.com blockverse - It is an art wall, a gallery, an online real estate space that is linked to the Ethereum blockchain. It is a place where the audience can secure their own blocks, expand ownership footprint and finally turn their space into whatever comes to mind. All thanks to the NFFT non fungible fillable token and the blockverse wall that is so much easier to browse compared to conventional NFT marketplaces.
  • NFFT token - Apart from being our pride and joy, it acts as the next generation of the conventional NFT smart contract, whilst its fillable functionality becomes the main differentiator between the two. This means that your token and real estate can become much more than just an art showcase space. It can be a place where the most prominent blockchain projects go to promote themselves and attract traffic. It can be a gateway to public figure profiles, a place where you can safely store, promote and sell your artwork or music, whilst ripping benefits from the organic traffic that NFFT.com gathers amplified by the other 9111 blocks owners.

results.name: Liquity
results.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol.
results.fullDescription: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to draw interest-free loans against Ether used as collateral. Loans are paid out in LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) and need to maintain a minimum collateral ratio of 110%. In addition to the collateral, the loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by fellow borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort. Learn more about these mechanisms in our documentation.

results.name: Gelato Network
results.description: Web3’s automation network
results.fullDescription:
Gelato Network is web3’s automation network, enabling developers to automate & relay arbitrary smart contract executions on and across all EVM-based compatible blockchains such as Ethereum. Gelato now has more than 3 flagship products, including Gelato Ops, Sorbet Finance, Gelato Relay, and more.

Gelato’s goal is to provide developers with a reliable, scalable & decentralized network to which they can outsource all of their web3 related DevOps operations.

Examples of which features are powered by Gelato include:

  • Limit Orders on PancakeSwap
  • Periodically updating debt ceilings on MakerDAO
  • Offering users gasless token claims on Connext
  • Automatically compounding yield farming vaults on Beefy Finance
  • Automating the breeding of new digital racehorse NFTs on ZED RUN
  • Rebasing of algorithmic stablecoins with Tomb Finance
  • Updating price oracles and TWAP on Abracadabra

results.name: Alchemy DAO
results.description: Alchemy allows users to create a DAO for any NFT
results.fullDescription: Alchemy allows users to create a tokenized DAO for any NFT. Turn your NFTs into liquid, community-controlled assets that can be traded, vote, and control all your NFTs. Create funds, communities, split collections between friends and all with no coding or technical experience.

results.name: Life Collection
results.description: Living Cellular Automata NFTs and DeFi merge for a win win simulation
results.fullDescription: Create cellular automata within a grid of cells and watch it come to life. Each BIO will also form part of a superorganism to interact together once all are minted. Be part of the simulation of the Game of Life and mint an organic BIO.

results.name: BillionDollarDapp
results.description: Like the old Million Dollar Homepage, but updated for web3.0 and inflation. A 10k pixel grid where each pixel is an #NFT that can be modified by its owner.
results.fullDescription:
Like #MillionDollarHomepage and #ArtBlocks had a baby. Each of the 100x100 pixels is an #NFT that forms a bigger work. Mint or rent for a #cause.  Set your color. Set your alt text. Generate income by renting the pixel out for others to temporarily set the color and alt text.

Each pixel is unique because it is generated based on the cryptographic hash produced by the Ethereum network during the creation process.

Dedication text can be added to each pixel on the Ethereum blockchain to represent the people, milestones, or causes the owner of the piece wants to bring attention to.

As the larger collaborative artwork grows, the threads on each pixel interact with adajcent pixels. These connections shift as more pixels are created.

Despite these shifting connections, each pixel is still intertwined with each other pixel in the artwork.

results.name: PolkaBridge
results.description:
PolkaBridge is a decentralized all-in-one financial applications platform.

The first bridge between Polkadot and other blockchains.
results.fullDescription:
What is PolkaBrige?

PolkaBridge is a decentralized application platform. One of PolkaBridge’s most noticeable product is PolkaBridge DEX — a decentralized exchange that allows users to swap tokens on Polkadot to other ones on other blockchain platforms without any centralized organizations. (On boarding soon) 

Why Polkadot?

- The Polkadot ecosystem is growing very fast. 

- Lower transaction fees than Ethereum. 

- Scalability, fast transaction processing on parachains. 

Why PolkaBridge?

PolkaBridge was born to be a stepping stone for the unification of all blockchains into a single network based on Polkadot, inheriting all the advantages of many different blockchain platforms.

In addition, by smart contract deflation mechanism, farmers are able to earn 90% of the PBR transaction fees by mining liquidity. 

PBR holders can get the chance to participate in IDOs that launch on PolkaBridge Launchpad. 

There will be also Lending, borrowing and prediction in the future, which will bring more high and stable profit for our supporters.

results.name: Ethereum Doubler
results.description: An application based on the smart contract network Ether to double the dividend in 12 hours
results.fullDescription: An application based on the smart contract network Ether to double the dividend in 12 hours.

results.name: Bondly
results.description: An interoperable, transparent, and portable swap protocol designed to revolutionize traditional escrow methods that empower the next generation of NFT creators.
results.fullDescription: Bondly is an interoperable, transparent, and portable swap protocol designed to revolutionize traditional escrow methods that empower the next generation of NFT creators. Anyone who enjoys collecting will know that feeling of owning something unique that brings you closer to your favourite musician, game, sports team or brand. Bondly is here for collectors, and is made for collectors, in the web 3.0 age. We believe in providing utility and money-can’t-buy experiences through NFTs to keep fans engaged, and their digital collectibles valuable. What’s more, we are paving the way with our platform infrastructure and protocols to empower the future of NFTs, with frictionless trade, cross-chain interoperability, and decentralized finance solutions.

results.name: Rally.io
results.description: Introducing Creator Coin. Custom branded digital currencies for content creators & their communities providing better engagement & value via better economics
results.fullDescription: Introducing Creator Coin. Custom branded digital currencies for content creators & their communities providing better engagement & value via better economics.

results.name: Token Locker
results.description: Lock your ERC20 tokens in this smart contract and prevent panic selling because of the high volatility.
results.fullDescription: Safely keep your tokens locked for a time period of your own choosing. Prevents you from making bad decisions and selling too early. It's free to use if you respect the unlock date for withdrawal that you have chosen.

results.name: Birbs
results.description: Birbs are randomly generated, animated, bird-like creatures that live on the Ethereum blockchain. There are 10,000 Birbs that you can own, collect, and trade.
results.fullDescription:
10,000 unique collectable and tradable Birbs powered by the awesome Ethereum network and ERC721 NFT standard.

During the sale event, you can purchase Birb eggs and once that round is over the eggs will hatch into a randomly generated Birb. There are tonnes of variations, some Birbs feature more rare traits than others and there are a bunch of little details to be on the hunt for.

Once the sale event is over, no more Birbs will ever be minted. Rare Birbs will become collectors' items and players can continue to collect and trade them on secondary markets like OpenSea.

results.name: Staking Saloon
results.description: Staking Saloon is a modular DeFi minigame based around NFT-staking. Stake Seascape NFTs to earn CWS rewards, with bonus combos possible.
results.fullDescription: Staking Saloon is the last in Seascape's initial series of modular DeFi Minigames. It is the first game based solely around Scapes, Seascape's original NFTs. Stake Scapes for Crowns rewards, which can be used anywhere in the Seascape ecosystem. Find special combos based on character, quality, and generation to get special bonus rewards!

results.name: Alkemi Earn
results.description: Institution-grade liquidity for digital assets.
results.fullDescription:
Alkemi Network provides institutions and exchanges with turnkey access to digital asset markets. We give our clients the tools they need to participate in a compliant environment within the decentralized financial ecosystem.

Alkemi Network is bridging CeFi to DeFi, building a decentralized liquidity network with a suite of tools and products that serve as onramps for everyone to participate in DeFi.

results.name: Krystal Wallet
results.description: Krystal is the simplest web3 wallet for everyone.
results.fullDescription: Krystal is the simplest non-custodial web3 wallet for everyone. Krystal’s cutting-edge portfolio management capabilities provides a comprehensive overview of one’s crypto portfolio across all EVM chains. Additionally, it notifies users of any major market movements, enabling them to assess any potential impact on their portfolio. Being an all-in-one provider of numerous on-chain transaction services, users can swap tokens, transfer assets and earn passive income via its decentralised staking and lending services. To ensure security of your assets, Krystal has multiple security features like two-factor authentication and revoke token approval, among many others. Users can also participate in token sales via its IDO launchpad, KrystalGO.

results.name: Elena Protocol
results.description: USE is a decentralized algorithmic stablecoin. Based on it, a new digital economy market will be built. USE is governed by Elena, supported by Oasis Vault, and
results.fullDescription: USE is a decentralized algorithmic stablecoin. Based on it, a new digital economy market will be built. USE is governed by Elena, supported by Oasis Vault, and adjusted by the PCV protocol.

results.name: SwapAll
results.description: SwapAll is designed to be a user-friendly DeFi trading platform with zero gas fees.
results.fullDescription: SwapAll, is a revolutionary cross-chain swap platform born under clapper, a Blockchain forecaster from Canada. Now that everyone can own all of their cryptocurrency assets through a cryptocurrency wallet, SwapAll revolutionizes what used to be the operating threshold with an APP that handles DeFi transactions on a single phone. It aims to provide a Layer2 solution based on all AMM (Automated Market Maker) type Dex, optimising volatile losses to the minimum and trading congestion free. SwapAll has three built-in trading pools: airdrop pool, liquidity pool, and NFT pool. It supports currency not only ETH and USDT, but also ETP and other currencies. There is no need to specially open the computer to connect the private key and buy and sell on multiple platforms. Only in SwapAll APP, users can complete their DeFi mining target.

results.name: Waifu.Art
results.description: Waifu.Art is a digital collection of AI-generated images as NFT tokens on Ethereum blockchain.
results.fullDescription:
Feeling lonely in crypto space? Get yourself a crypto waifu! Or maybe even a couple of waifus!

Every waifu is a NFT token stored in Ethereum blockchain with an unique AI-generated image. There is a total of just 2048 tokens. They were very carefully handpicked from over 400,000 images generated by neural network.

What you can do with your waifu?

• Hodl, chill and have fun

• Trade your digital collectibles on p2p NFT marketplaces

• Send links to your waifus to your friends so they can like them

And remember: having a waifu makes your friends jealous!

results.name: Crypto Brawlers
results.description: Crypto Brawlers - Fight and gamble with collectible NFTs
results.fullDescription:
CryptoBrawlers is the collectible NFT fighting dApp! Beautiful hand drawn art, but with a twist. Don't just collect and trade brawlers like some common cat, compete with them! The stakes are high: lose the fight and lose your brawler. However the rewards are just as sweet, win the brawl and receive the defeated fighter as the spoils of war!

Each brawler is minted with randomised stats, character and rarity. Manage to mint a legendary and you have a truly one of a kind NFT collectible with differing art to the rest of the character set. The rarity counts for each brawler are thus:

  • Legendary: 1
  • Epic: 5
  • Rare: 25
  • Uncommon: 125
  • Common: 500

results.name: MurAll Revo1t
results.description:
A digital, immutable, collaborative mural that anyone anywhere can draw on, without restrictions.

See the Evolution. Be the Revolution.
results.fullDescription:
MurAll is a collaborative canvas allowing artists worldwide to paint onto an ever evolving piece of art. This is a first of its kind project made possible by the use of blockchain technology.

Powered by the Ethereum network, MurAll requires a digital token called PAINT to enable artists to draw onto the canvas. Each PAINT token can draw 2 pixels and just like real-life paint, it can only be used to draw once. If it has been used it can’t be taken off of the wall and reused! 

With only a finite amount of PAINT available globally (there is only enough PAINT to cover the canvas 21,000 times), it is a commodity that encourages artists to produce work they are passionate about as the more PAINT that is used, the less is available.

Once an artist has created their piece and “minted” it on the MurAll canvas, it is immortalised forever on the blockchain. The artist receives an NFT (Non Fungible Token) of their drawing; in contrast to traditional tokens, NFTs are one of a kind, ensuring that the artwork is a UNIQUE ORIGINAL which has value and can be kept or sold whenever they wish - just like real-life paintings. Unlike most existing technologies, the artwork itself is contained within the token and isn't just a certificate.

results.name: Wasabix Finance
results.description: Wasabix's ambitious mission is to build a cross-chain yield-backed AMM DEX DAO.
results.fullDescription:
Wasabix's ambitious mission is to build a cross-chain yield-backed AMM DEX DAO. Currently Wasabix operates on two networks: Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain.  

The platform's structure can be described in following products:  

1) Y.U.M. - Yield-backed Ultimate Machine on Ethereum Network and Binance Smart Chain.

2) The bridge - Yield-backed ETH-FTM-BSC bridge.

Wasabix finance already deployed serval strategies in last few weeks. User can chose their favorite protocols to boosts a higher APY rewards, and wasabi token holders will be part of the governance.

results.name: Unstoppable NFT Backups
results.description:
Are you sure your NFT's are safe?
Make sure to take a snapshot to avoid a rug pull and lose your NFT art.
results.fullDescription: Our Unstoppable NFT Dapp keeps precious NFTs safe at all times. It lets you backup NFTs in a few clicks; and the most beautiful part is that the backup resides on our unstoppable decentralized storage solution, meaning no one can take down that backup. Our NFT Backup DApp currently supports Rarible, Superare and Opensea (except the untransferred gasless mints).

results.name: Guild of Guardians
results.description: Mobile RPG where gamers turn their passion into NFTs.
results.fullDescription:
Guild Of Guardians is a mobile RPG which will allow players to turn their gaming passions into assets. It will be a multiplayer, fantasy, action RPG where players build their dream team of ‘Guardians’ and compete in a guild to earn epic rewards. 


Guild of Guardians is developed by Stepico and published by Immutable. Stepico Games is a leading Ukrainian game development studio with a team of more than 80 designers, artists and developers. They have developed multiple mobile titles in the strategy and RPG space, which have received more than 5 million downloads. 


Immutable is an industry leading $17m VC-funded blockchain company backed by investors such as Naspers, Galaxy Digital and Coinbase. They are responsible for launching the most successful blockchain Trading Card Game, Gods Unchained, which is headed up by Chris Clay, the former director of Magic the Gathering Arena.

results.name: Pyra - Arteon
results.description: Best dapp rise again and this time comes with new Token named ARTEON. Arteon is next-gen token that comes with new features like Mining, staking, and NFTs.
results.fullDescription:
Best Dapp rise again and this time comes with a new Token named ARTEON. Arteon is the next-gen token that comes with new features like Mining, staking, and NFTs.

results.name: Inverse finance
results.description: Inverse Finance is a yield aggregator and a lending protocol
results.fullDescription: Inverse.finance is a suite of permissionless decentralized finance tools governed by Inverse DAO, a decentralized autonomous organization running on the Ethereum blockchain. The main Inverse.finance products are Anchor, DOLA and DCA Vaults

results.name: XDAO
results.description: MultiChain DAO Ecosystem Made for Decentralized Future
results.fullDescription:
XDAO – expanding multichain DAO ecosystem is built for a decentralized future. Behind this project stands a highly qualified team with a strong background in crypto. XDAO was successfully launched on Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, HECO and is going to further expand into more blockchains. The main idea of XDAO is to allow people to create a decentralized autonomous organization of any size. XDAO is working on delivering a product that reveals the full potential of a company on a blockchain by providing it with all the tools they need for successful operations. For more savvy users XDAO can also be described as an off‐chain voting mechanism with on‐chain execution. The XDAO team are winners of the BSC Hackathon, HECO Hackathon and have received a grant from Polygon over the summer of 2021.

What makes XDAO different from other DAO builders:

  1. Modular Structure (everything you want to have in your DAO can be implemented through modules: Snapshot Integration, Timelock controller, voice delegation, etc.).
  2. Hybrid voting (Cheaper and faster voting).
  3. Direct Interaction with DeFi through Wallet Connect.
  4.  DAO ecosystem where investors can come in, analyze, and invest in the most perspective projects.

What can be done with XDAO:

  • DeFi project treasury team management.
  • Salary treasury/marketing treasury for any blockchain organization.
  • Grant program/bug bounty 
  • Investing in DeFi with mutual 
  • Investing in NFT and 
  • Charity.
  • Joint participation in any Allocations, IDOs or Launchpads.
  • Family treasury management and many other use cases.

results.name: ChainText
results.description: Collaborative text NFTs
results.fullDescription: Take advantage of the first text-based NFT. Write your own text and let it live forever on the Ethereum blockchain. Unlike most NFTs, ChainTexts can change after being created; you or future owners can add text to an existing ChainText token.
